titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the apprehending of robbers or highway-men and for a reward to the apprehenders
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd and by Henry Hills and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall this one and thirtieth day of January, 1682/3 and in the five and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
